metadata.name: Soaring Freedom
metadata.description:
1 year ago today, when I made my first ever tweet, I never knew that I was becoming a part of something so huge and special! Something that would change my life so exceptionally! The last year has taught me so much more than what I’ve learnt during my entire lifetime. I grew not just as an artist but as a human as well.

‘Soaring Freedom’ is an edition celebrating this day, my 1st Anniversary in the NFT space. It is a token of appreciation, love and gratitude to this amazing community. The piece represents us becoming winged and flying into freedom through WEB3. 

Edition: Open  
Collection: Pranay Bhatnagar Anniversary Editions  
Shot by: Pranay Bhatnagar, a wildlife biologist based in India  
Location: Desert National Park, Rajasthan, India

Licence: Extended Editorial  
Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
